articles.title: Classic Aussie dessert is pulled from shelves for shocking reason
articles.author: Cassidy Pearce
articles.summary: The Cheesecake Shop has announced that their Pavlova will now be a seasonal product, leading to confusion and disappointment among customers. The company cited seasonal fruit availability as a potential reason, while others suggested egg supply shortages could be a factor for this product change.

articles.title: OpenAI rebrands itself
articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.summary: OpenAI has rebranded with a new typeface, OpenAI sans, that blends geometric precision with an approachable character, and a redrawn logo featuring cleaner lines and slightly larger space in the center. The company utilized its AI tools like ChatGPT to calculate type weights during the design process and integrated tools like DALL·E and Sora as thought partners.

articles.title: A Tiny, Portable Projector to Replace Your TV
articles.author: Dave Holmes
articles.summary: TCL has launched its first smart projector, the A1, a light and portable device with Google TV. The A1 features automatic keystone correction, screen sizes adjusting from 45" to 120", and outputs a crisp 1080p picture. The projector includes Dolby speakers and can be used outdoors for activities such as Backyard Video Night.

articles.title: 5 New Releases to Watch on Netflix in February 2025
articles.author: Dhoom Dhaam
articles.summary: Netflix will introduce new content releases in February 2025. The announcement highlights the upcoming addition of new movies and shows to its streaming service.

articles.title: Syntheia Launches AssistantNLP, Elevating Customer Interaction with AI-Powered Receptionist Service
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Syntheia Corp. has commercially launched its new product, AssistantNLP, beginning with its first service: the AI-Powered Receptionist. This AI-powered service uses natural language processing to manage inbound calls, initially supporting English with plans to add more languages.

articles.title: Syntheia Launches AssistantNLP, Elevating Customer Interaction with AI-Powered Receptionist Service
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Syntheia Corp. has commercially launched AssistantNLP, an AI-powered receptionist service designed to improve customer engagement through natural language processing. The service, which initially supports English, offers various pricing tiers, including a freemium option, and has already been deployed in multiple industries, leading to time and cost savings along with improved customer satisfaction for early adopters.

articles.title: Syntheia Launches AssistantNLP, Elevating Customer Interaction with AI-Powered Receptionist Service
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Syntheia Corp. has commercially launched AssistantNLP, a conversational AI solution. The initial offering is an AI-Powered Receptionist, designed to manage inbound telephone calls using natural language processing. It currently supports English, with plans for more languages soon.

articles.title: Get Ready for .Channel Website Domains
articles.author: Arol Wright
articles.summary: Google Registry has launched '.channel', a new top-level domain (TLD) intended for content creators. This TLD helps with building online presence, selling products, and connecting with audiences. Content creators can use '.channel' to set up merch stores.

articles.title: Optimal Blue Introduces Seven Major Innovations at Its Inaugural User Summit in San Diego
articles.author: Optimal Blue
articles.summary: Optimal Blue introduced a series of new products and features at its Summit user conference in San Diego. A major announcement included the launch of Ask Obi AI assistant, aimed at providing high-impact solutions to lenders without additional cost.

articles.title: What goes into designing that popular teapot or water bottle? 2 top creators discuss the process
articles.author: KIM COOK
articles.summary: Scott Henderson and ZVerse developed the ZShield face shield. Whipsaw collaborated with Owala on the FreeSip water bottle, which received recognition from TIME and The New York Times. Whipsaw also partnered with Tonal to create a smart home gym and with Life360 to refine the Tile tracker's design. Whipsaw's Dan Harden also designed the Ravenchord piano, which reimagines the traditional instrument.

articles.title: A foldable powerhouse
articles.author: Komsan John Jandamit
articles.summary: The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6 features a large foldable screen suitable for multitasking, reading, and watching videos without a kickstand, along with loud speakers for media consumption. It supports DEX for a Windows-like experience when connected to external displays, and it accepts S Pen stylus inputs (sold separately). The phone offers AI features like circle to search, object eraser and live translation, but photo and video quality is mediocre.

articles.title: Metro Moves: Little Man Ice Cream is coming to Cherry Creek this year
articles.author: Bernadette Berdychowski
articles.summary: Little Man Ice Cream is expanding to Cherry Creek, opening its 11th location later this year as part of Town Pump Provisions. The new shop will offer classic and original flavors, along with exclusive options specific to the Cherry Creek location, providing a new service for the neighborhood.

articles.title: FMCG companies step up play to stay ahead in q-commerce race
articles.author: Sagar Malviya
articles.summary: Consumer goods companies such as Hindustan Unilever, Marico, Adani Wilmar, and Parle are creating separate sales and distribution teams for quick commerce. Parle plans to launch niche products like sugar-free biscuits first in quick commerce platforms.

articles.title: ‘It requires a monthly subscription': Man tries to get in Smart Samsung Fridge for a Zero Sugar Dr. Pepper. There's just one problem
articles.author: Natasha Dubash
articles.summary: Samsung's Bespoke smart refrigerator, featuring a 'door within door' design, allows users to access frequently used items while minimizing air loss. The refrigerator includes an auto-open feature, where a door sensor opens the door with a simple touch for convenient access. The correct operation involves placing a hand on the door sensor.

articles.title: What Is The Oldest Soft Drink In America?
articles.author: Holly Tishfield
articles.summary: Vernors Ginger Ale, created by James Vernor in Detroit, Michigan, is the oldest soft drink in the U.S., debuting before Coca-Cola and Dr Pepper. The ginger ale, initially created in the 1860s, is still sold in grocery stores today.

articles.title: iPhones Are Getting a Native Porn App. What Is Hot Tub?
articles.author: Luis Prada
articles.summary: Hot Tub, a dedicated pornography application, has launched for iOS devices in the European Union. It is available through the AltStore PAL and allows users to browse and watch content from sites like PornHub and XHamster without ads. The launch is enabled by the EU's Digital Markets Act, which compels Apple to allow alternative app stores.

articles.title: Marks and Spencer 'gorgeously soft' £45 dress that makes shoppers feel 'classy'
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: M&S has released the Cloud-Yarn Roll Neck Knitted Dress, priced at £45, designed for wear throughout winter and spring. The dress comes in two neutral shades and is made from a luxurious cloud yarn. Customer reviews indicate warmth and comfort, though one reviewer noted an unflattering fit.

articles.title: Here's how to save nearly £100 on this app-controlled coffee machine
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Nespresso is offering a deal on the Vertuo Next coffee machine, reducing the price to £69.99. The machine uses compact Nespresso pods of different sizes and includes a complimentary set of 12 pods, offering sizes from espresso to lungo.

articles.title: Here's how to save nearly £100 on this app-controlled coffee machine
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Nespresso Vertuo Next machine is on sale at Amazon and John Lewis for £69.99, a 58% reduction from its usual price of £167.99. The machine includes features like Wi-Fi connectivity, barcode reading technology for optimal brewing, and a 30-second heat-up time, and comes with a welcome set of 12 pods.

articles.title: 'I tried Dyson's three most viral products – one of them blew me away'
articles.author: Adam Cailler Senior reporter
articles.summary: Dyson launched its new Car+Boat handheld vacuum, which the company claims to be its most powerful handheld vacuum with market-leading battery run time. The article also mentions the Dyson Purifier Hot+Cool Formaldehyde, a heater that purifies and cools, and the Dyson Airwrap multi-styler and dryer, a versatile hair styling tool.

articles.title: Adobe Acrobat AI now reads and explains your contracts in minutes — here's how it works
articles.summary: Adobe has launched new AI-powered features within its software to streamline contract analysis. This enhancement helps users understand contract terms, compare versions, and quickly locate specific information within documents. The new feature intends to expedite contract reviews, potentially cutting review times by 70-80%.

articles.title: ChatGPT's AI agents are here, and this is how I want to use them
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched two new AI agents, Operator and Deep Research, as functionalities within ChatGPT. Operator assists with tasks like searching for information and making reservations, while Deep Research provides in-depth reports on various topics. These AI agents are designed to help users with everyday tasks and research, aiming to improve efficiency and free up time.

articles.title: LUV Car Wash Launches Valentine's Campaign with New Fresh Floral Experience and Charitable Partnership
articles.author: Mike Fahey
articles.summary: LUV Car Wash introduced a new "Fresh Floral Tunnel Scent" at all 75+ locations starting February 1st. To celebrate Valentine's Day, LUV Car Wash offered the "True LUV" package for $10 on 2/14, a $17 discount.

articles.title: C-suite AI Choices: Artificial Intelligence Or Artificial Stupidity
articles.author: Dean De Biase
articles.summary: Dermalogica is leveraging AI to personalize customer experiences through tools like the Face Mapping digital skin analysis and custom GPTs for product development. The AI-driven initiatives, including personalized product recommendations and rapid concept iteration, have doubled conversion rates. Dermalogica is also using AI to translate marketing materials into 30 languages instantaneously.

articles.title: The 5 Best Dyson Vacuums That Offer Superior Cleaning On Every Surface
articles.author: Sholeen Damarwala
articles.summary: Dyson offers a range of vacuums, including the V15 Detect, a powerful cordless model with user-friendly features for 2025. The V8 is a budget-friendly option, while the Gen5 Detect is a high-end upgrade. The Gen5 Detect features Dyson's fastest motor and advanced filtration, capturing tiny particles. The Dyson Cyclone V10 Animal is designed for pet owners, effectively removing fur from carpets and upholstery.

articles.title: Valentine's Day Is for Using the Good Stuff
articles.summary: Currentbody has launched a new red-light mask. The updated model features improved straps and chin coverage for a snug fit. This new product is intended for deep skin care routines.

articles.title: Apple issues official warning as first porn app is launched on iPhones
articles.author: Jess Battison
articles.summary: A new ad-free adult content browser app, 'Hot Tub,' has launched on AltStore PAL for EU iPhone users, allowing access to videos from sites like Pornhub and XHamster. Apple has issued a warning, expressing concerns about the app's safety risks for users, particularly children, and stating they would never approve it for their App Store. Apple allows the app to be distributed by marketplace operators like AltStore and Epic, due to the European Commission regulations.

articles.title: Samsung's flagship store at BKC sets a record with over 700 early deliveries of the new Galaxy S25 Series smartphones
articles.author: The Hans India
articles.summary: Samsung celebrated the successful launch and early delivery of its new Galaxy S25 series at its BKC flagship store, handing over devices to over 700 pre-order customers. The Galaxy S25 series, including the Galaxy S25 Ultra and Galaxy S25+, features a Snapdragon® 8 Elite Mobile Platform for Galaxy chipset, One UI 7 and integrated AI agents, marking Samsung's mission to deliver AI capabilities to its consumers.

articles.title: The best Android phones
articles.author: Allison Johnson
articles.summary: The article reviews newly released Android phones, including the Google Pixel 9 series with its AI-powered Screenshots app, the Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra featuring enhanced software and AI capabilities, and the OnePlus 13 known for its extended battery life and fast charging. Additionally, it covers the Google Pixel 9 Pro Fold with its user-friendly foldable design and the Nothing Phone 2, highlighting its unique LED light strips for notifications.

articles.title: DeepSeek deployed in Tencent Cloud
articles.author: Global Times
articles.summary: Tencent Cloud has launched DeepSeek's R1 model on its Hyper Application Inventor service, enabling developers to easily access the AI service. Huawei also launched the DeepSeek R1 model on its cloud service. This allows developers to bypass complex setup processes and start using the AI model within minutes.

articles.title: Elevate your bathroom experience with American Standard's all-new Smart Washer M-Bidet
articles.author: Business Mirror
articles.summary: American Standard has launched the Smart Washer M-bidet, a manual bidet featuring a dual nozzle for feminine and posterior cleansing and an intuitive side lever to switch between functions. The bidet offers adjustable water pressure and nozzle rinsing, providing a more comfortable and hygienic cleansing experience, and is available nationwide through American Standard dealer partners either as a standalone unit or bundled with American Standard toilet collections.

articles.title: 10 ways to practice self-love on Valentine's Day
articles.author: Nora Colomer
articles.summary: The article recommends a range of products for Valentine's Day self-care, including TokyoMilk's Dead Sexy Handcreme, Goop's G.Tox Himalayan Salt Scalp Scrub Shampoo, Osea Vagus Nerve bath oil, Clarins V-Facial Instant Depuffing Face Mask, Therabody's Theragun mini, Leesa Sleep's weighted blanket, and AeroGarden. These products are suggested as ways to practice self-love and promote well-being.

articles.title: Why Apple, a porn app, and Trump's possible tariff war are connected
articles.summary: Hot Tub, a new app, is now available to iPhone users in the European Union through AltStore, an alternative app store. Apple is objecting to this app's availability, as it circumvents Apple's app store restrictions and is accessible due to new EU regulations.

articles.title: How AI Agents Are Changing The Game For Early-Stage Entrepreneurs
articles.author: Aytekin Tank
articles.summary: The article highlights the rise of AI agents in 2025, offering significant advantages for startups. Specifically, QA agents like fix.ai can monitor company processes, and Origami agents can boost sales by identifying potential leads, ultimately allowing businesses to focus on core priorities and growth.

articles.title: nuVizz Unveils AI-Powered 'Vizzard' for Smarter Last-Mile Logistics
articles.author: Nuvizz
articles.summary: nuVizz's last-mile TMS solution supports various industries with AI-based models. The nuVizz platform offers cutting-edge solutions for last-mile logistics challenges, including Vizzard. nuVizz helps to find the way in last-mile ELD integrations by delivering last-mile/delivery solutions.

articles.title: Vodafone's Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra deal is a steal
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 Ultra on February 6, featuring a revamped design with rounded cameras and the Snapdragon Gen 8 Elite processor for improved battery life. Mobiles.co.uk and other providers offer deals and freebies for the new phone. Reviews, however, have criticized the upgrades as being minor.

articles.title: Canadian Black-owned brands to shop all year round
articles.author: Emily Tamfo
articles.summary: Fumi The Label introduces a universally flattering ribbed maxi dress, available in multiple colors. Sagal Ali launches Yolande candle, sustainably-made and named after inspiring women. Elizabeth Shabi created Clear Fight serum which helps boost hydration and combat acne-prone skin. Reona designs minimal, functional luxury suit trousers in chocolate, macadamia, and sand.

articles.title: nuVizz Unveils AI-Powered "Vizzard' for Smarter Last-Mile Logistics
articles.summary: nuVizz has released version 10.01 of its software, which includes nuVizz's new AI assistant, Vizzard. This AI assistant is designed to transform last-mile operations using data-driven insights and AI technology to address logistics challenges.

articles.title: nuVizz Unveils AI-Powered 'Vizzard' for Smarter Last-Mile Logistics
articles.author: nu Vizz
articles.summary: nuVizz released its latest software version 10.01 featuring Vizzard, an AI assistant. Vizzard is designed to transform last-mile operations using data-driven insights and AI technology. This update marks a decade of advancements in last-mile logistics.

articles.title: AI prompt engineer's best advice to get exactly what you want: ‘Think about giving instructions to a child'
articles.author: Kelly Daniel
articles.summary: CNBC launched an online course titled "How to Use AI to Be More Successful at Work." The course focuses on training individuals to utilize AI effectively in their professional lives, covering topics like effective prompt-writing. A discount is offered until February 11, 2025.

articles.title: RTW Releases TouchControl 5 Version 1.3
articles.author: RBR-TVBR
articles.summary: RTW has released a free software update (version 1.3) for its TouchControl 5 hardware metering device, introducing a dialog-gated loudness measurement technology. This update includes a dedicated Netflix loudness preset, enabling compliance with dialog-based specifications aligned with Netflix delivery standards. TouchControl 5 is the first hardware metering device to feature dialog-gated loudness.

articles.title: Adobe Acrobat AI Assistant Can Compare And Summarise Complex Contracts
articles.author: Mark Sparrow
articles.summary: Adobe has introduced new intelligent contract capabilities in Acrobat AI Assistant. This new feature uses generative AI to simplify contract review by grasping complex terms and spotting differences between contract versions. Acrobat AI Assistant is available as an add-on for $4.99 per month for both free Reader and paid Acrobat for individual customers.

articles.title: Kepler's New AI Technology Doubles Ecommerce Conversion Rates
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Kepler has launched PDP+, a new technology aimed at improving e-commerce product pages. The system utilizes Kip AI and human oversight to create enhanced product detail pages, resulting in significant improvements in conversion rates and revenue for early adopters. Ravensburger has also seen improvements in visibility and downstream results on their Amazon pages through PDP+.

articles.title: Kepler's New AI Technology Doubles Ecommerce Conversion Rates
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Kepler has launched PDP+, a new technology designed to enhance e-commerce product pages. PDP+ combines Kepler Intelligence Platform (Kip) AI with human oversight to optimize product descriptions and visual content, leading to increased conversion rates and sales revenue. Early adopters have experienced significant improvements, including doubled conversion rates and a 6% increase in sales revenue.

articles.title: CWENCH Hydration™ Strengthens its Retail Footprint in Western Canada with Placement in 75 Locations of London Drugs
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Cizzle Brands anticipates new products and potential sales and distribution opportunities. The forward-looking information includes expectations regarding the company's activities, events, or developments in the future, particularly concerning the introduction of new products.

articles.title: 'Far Cry New Dawn' arrives on Xbox Game Pass
articles.author: CT Desk
articles.summary: Ubisoft's Far Cry New Dawn has been added to Microsoft's Xbox Game Pass in February 2025, becoming the 14th title added this year. The game is accessible to Xbox Game Pass members across all tiers except XGP Core and is available on Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, and PC, including via Xbox Cloud Gaming for Ultimate members.

articles.title: Nothing Phone 3(a) Maybe Launched With This iPhone 16 Feature
articles.summary: Nothing is set to launch its new smartphone, the Nothing Phone 3(a), on March 4, 2025. The phone is rumored to feature an iPhone-like Action Button and may be powered by a Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 chipset, with a potential price range under Rs. 30,000. The brand has released visuals showcasing the device, available for purchase on Flipkart.

articles.title: Teleperformance wins 2025 BIG Innovation Award for its GenAI-powered advanced interaction analytics platform that delivers actionable CX insights in near real-time
articles.author: Teleperformance
articles.summary: Teleperformance (TP) received a 2025 BIG Innovation Award for its interaction analytics platform. This platform utilizes generative AI (GenAI) and natural language processing (NLP) to enhance customer experience programs. The platform aims to improve first-contact resolution, compliance, customer satisfaction, and sales conversions.

articles.title: Exciting new software wants to be the Android of smartglasses
articles.author: Andy Boxall
articles.summary: Mentra and Vuzix have announced AugmentOS, a new operating system for smart glasses. AugmentOS is described as a universal OS with AI-powered features, an app store, and development benefits. Three smart glasses models currently support AugmentOS: Even Realities G1, the Vuzix Z100, and the Mentra Mach1.

articles.title: AdCreative.ai Review: How It Performed for My Ad Campaigns
articles.author: Techpoint
articles.summary: AdCreative.ai is an AI tool designed to generate high-converting ads across different channels. A user tested AdCreative.ai to evaluate its ability to save time and improve ad campaign results.

articles.title: Innovation Redefined - The Samsung S25 Series Takes Tech to the Next Level
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the new Samsung S25, a flagship phone with an all-new design. It integrates enhanced battery performance, industry-leading camera capabilities, and advanced AI-driven features.

articles.title: Still giving out your phone number for Signal? Switch to a username instead
articles.author: Mikael Thalen
articles.summary: Signal introduced a new username feature to enhance user privacy. This allows users to communicate without sharing their phone numbers. Users can also adjust settings to prevent others from finding them via their phone number.

articles.title: NexusTek Launches Secure AI Platform to Address Generative AI Challenges
articles.author: Nexus Tek
articles.summary: NexusTek launched the NexusTek Secure AI Platform on February 4, 2025. This platform is a comprehensive solution that enables businesses to leverage generative AI while ensuring data security, oversight, and compliance. It aims to provide productivity benefits through AI.

articles.title: The Dirtiest Martinis Take Inspo From Your Favorite Salads
articles.author: Holly Tishfield
articles.summary: The Caesar Tini, inspired by Caesar salad, is a new cocktail that blends the flavors of a Caesar salad with the elegance of a dirty martini. The cocktail includes vodka, olive brine (preferably garlic-infused), lemon juice, anchovy juice, and Cardini Caesar salad dressing, garnished with garlic-stuffed olives, black pepper, and olive oil. It is prepared like a dirty martini with some salad-inspired twists.

articles.title: 'Powerful' cordless pressure washer that cleans patios and cars is now less than £60
articles.author: Phoebe Barton
articles.summary: The Garden Force Jet Hawk Cordless Portable Pressure Washer is now available at Yimbly, Argos, and Amazon. It features a cordless design, water syphoning technology, a high-capacity battery for 45 minutes of use, and a 6-in-1 multi-nozzle for spray control. The device is designed for cleaning patios, garden furniture, windows, and cars.

articles.title: Lidl reveals limited edition Valentine's Day box for £5
articles.author: Carlo Simone
articles.summary: Lidl is launching a limited-edition Valentine's Day beauty and wellness box, called the Premium Home & Beauty Set, priced at £5. The box features items from Lidl's new Deluxe Home & Beauty Bays and will be available on their website from February 6th. This launch follows the success of their first Beauty Box last February.

articles.title: GN Store Nord stock rises following new hearing aid platforms launch
articles.summary: GN Store Nord launched two new hearing aid platforms, ReSound Vivia and ReSound Savi, available from February 20th in the U.S. and Germany. ReSound Vivia is presented as the smallest AI hearing aid with superior speech-in-noise capabilities and a long-lasting rechargeable battery, while ReSound Savi offers advanced connectivity features.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy G Fold: All About the Triple-Fold Smartphone
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: Samsung is planning to introduce the Galaxy G Fold, its first triple-fold smartphone, potentially in January 2026. The Galaxy G Fold features a unique G-shaped folding mechanism and a large, possibly 12.4-inch, display when fully unfolded. It will join Samsung's expanding foldable lineup, including the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7.

articles.title: Limited-edition Valentine's Day gift: Get the viral Shark FlexStyle in Black Cherry now 🍒
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Shark has launched a limited-edition Black Cherry colorway for its FlexStyle Air Styling and Drying System. This versatile hair styling tool, known for being a more affordable alternative to the Dyson Airwrap, is now available for purchase on Shark's website.

articles.title: Zoho Corporation Announces Zia Agents; AI Platform Supporting Autonomous Agents Across Organization's Broad Portfolio
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Zoho Corporation is rolling out new AI capabilities to a limited set of customers, with plans for monthly expansion. These AI solutions are informed by a vast range of functional data from Zoho and ManageEngine. This initiative is driven by Zoho Corporation's technological breadth, shared data model, and owned tech stack.

articles.title: Lidl's selling 1,000 'luxury beauty hampers' worth £60 for £5
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Lidl launched its Premium Home and Beauty Set, a £5 bundle worth £60, online on February 6. The set includes various home and beauty products from Lidl's Deluxe Home and Beauty Bays. Lidl Plus users can also enjoy a 15% discount on selected Deluxe Home and Beauty Products in-store until February 12.

articles.title: Adobe Acrobat AI Assistant Introduces New Generative AI Features to Make Understanding Contracts Easier for Everyone
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Adobe announced new intelligent contract capabilities in Acrobat AI Assistant. These generative AI features simplify contract work by helping customers grasp complex terms and identify differences between multiple agreements.

articles.title: 'Powerful' pressure washer that 'obliterates dirt' is ideal for tidying gardens before spring
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Bosch EasyAquatak 110 High-Pressure Washer at a reduced price of £67. The Bosch model features three nozzles for various cleaning tasks. Argos has also reduced the price of the Black + Decker Vertical Pressure Washer to £57, featuring a self-priming function.

articles.title: Parents are racing to Aldi's middle aisle to snap up the perfect sleepover bargain – and you get change from a fiver too
articles.author: Sarah Bull
articles.summary: Aldi is offering the Adventuridge airbed, suitable for camping and sleepovers, at a discounted price of £3.99. The airbed, which can hold up to 22.7kg, has been spotted in various Aldi stores and has received positive feedback from customers.

articles.title: Parents are racing to Aldi's middle aisle to snap up the perfect sleepover bargain – and you get change from a fiver too
articles.author: Sarah Bull
articles.summary: Aldi introduced the Adventuridge airbed, priced at £3.99. This airbed is suitable for camping, travel, and sleepovers, supporting a maximum weight of 22.7kg. It is also available on camping.

articles.title: Get Ninja's Double Stack Air-Fryer for the lowest price by stockpiling these two sales
articles.author: Harriet Morphy-Morris
articles.summary: Ninja is offering its Double Stack Air-Fryer at a reduced price through its website and TopCashback. The air fryer features a 9.5-liter capacity, a space-saving stacked design, and six cooking functions including Max crisp, Air fry, Roast, Bake, Reheat, and Dehydrate.

articles.title: Lidl launches £5 'luxury' beauty box packed with £60 worth of products
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Lidl is launching the "Lidl Premium Home and Beauty Set," a luxury hamper filled with beauty products worth £60, available for £5. The set includes items from Lidl's Deluxe Home and Beauty Bays and will be available online from February 6th. Lidl Plus users can also enjoy 15% off a selection of Deluxe Home and Beauty Products in store until February 12.

articles.title: Lidl's £5 'luxury' beauty box that's packed with £60 worth of products
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Lidl is launching the "Lidl Premium Home & Beauty Set," a luxury hamper filled with beauty treats worth £60, for just £5. The set includes items from Lidl's Deluxe Home and Beauty Bays, featuring products like D'Avignon Handwash, Luxury Hand Lotion, Aromatic Body Cleanser, Deluxe Speciality Tea, Manuka Honey, and Multivitamin Gummies. Orders open on February 6th and Lidl Plus users can also enjoy 15% off a selection of Deluxe Home and Beauty Products in store until February 12.

articles.title: Brand-driven content builds anticipation: Xiaomi unveils revolutionary features ahead of Redmi Note 14 Series launch
articles.author: Xiaomi
articles.summary: Xiaomi is launching the Redmi Note 14 Series, including the Redmi Note 14 Pro+ 5G, on February 11, 2025. The Pro+ model features a 200MP camera with OIS, up to 512GB storage, 120W fast charging, and a 5110mAh battery, along with IP68 dust and water resistance and Corning Gorilla Glass Victus display.

articles.title: Advertisers want to try Threads, content moderation or not.
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: Advertisers are eager to test new ad features on Threads, anticipating access to new audiences and lower ad costs. Ads were launched on Threads last month with a handful of brands.

articles.title: I love expensive salon haircare as I'm a hairdresser – I just found a £3 M&S buy that's as good as my £60 one
articles.author: Kate Kulniece
articles.summary: M&S has launched a new haircare range featuring a £3 shampoo and conditioner. The products are sulphate and silicone-free, incorporating ingredients like micro algae extract and pink grapefruit extract. A hairdresser and TikToker praised the range, saying the haircare range is as good as salon-quality products.

articles.title: Get 30% off CeraVe, Aesop and more with new revolutionary AI-driven beauty brand
articles.author: Eve Rowlands
articles.summary: Noli, a new beauty brand, has launched a personalized skincare service that utilizes AI technology to provide customized routines and product recommendations. The platform offers skin analysis, creates a 'BeautyDNA' profile for each user, and features products from brands like CeraVe, La Roche-Posay, and Kiehl's at discounted prices. Customer feedback indicates a positive reception to the service, praising its personalization and effectiveness.

articles.title: Get 30% off CeraVe, Aesop and more with new revolutionary AI-driven beauty brand
articles.author: Eve Rowlands
articles.summary: Noli launched a personalized skincare service employing AI technology, featuring a diagnostic quiz and facial scan to generate 'BeautyDNA' profiles and recommend products from brands like La Roche-Posay and CeraVe. The platform aims to simplify skincare routines by offering customized recommendations based on individual skin concerns, with an introductory discount code available for new users.

articles.title: 'Future of beauty shopping' offering skincare routines with huge 30%
articles.author: Eve Rowlands
articles.summary: Noli, a new beauty brand, has launched an AI-powered platform that offers personalized skincare routines. The platform provides free skin analysis tools and discounted, curated selections of high-end skincare products. Noli creates personalized 'BeautyDNA' profiles to recommend ideal routines using data-driven insights.

articles.title: Get 30% off CeraVe, Aesop and more with new revolutionary AI-driven beauty brand
articles.author: Eve Rowlands
articles.summary: Noli, a new beauty brand, has launched a platform that utilizes AI to offer personalized skincare routines featuring various brands like CeraVe and La Roche-Posay at discounted prices. The platform offers free skin analysis tools and creates a unique 'BeautyDNA' profile for each user, tailoring product recommendations based on skin type, lifestyle, and preferences, while also offering a promotional code for new users to enjoy a discount on their orders.

articles.title: Get 30% off CeraVe, Aesop and more with 'revolutionary' AI-driven
articles.author: Eve Rowlands
articles.summary: Noli, a new beauty brand, has launched a service that provides tailored skincare plans using AI-powered technology. The platform offers free skin analysis and recommends high-end products from brands like CeraVe, La Roche-Posay, and Kiehls, often at discounted prices. New users can receive a £20 discount on orders over £60 using the promotional code NOLIMATCH20.

articles.title: IFF Adds Real-Time Consumer Feedback into Fragrance Creation with Introduction of AI-Powered ScentChat™ App
articles.author: IFF
articles.summary: IFF launched ScentChat™, a new AI-powered research tool designed to enhance fragrance creation. The application facilitates real-time consumer feedback, coupled with qualitative insights via direct connection with messaging platforms, unlocking co-creation opportunities to develop scents that people love.

articles.title: ‘I Have a Second Brain': Zomato CEO Deepinder Goyal Seeks AI-Driven Business and Product Leaders; Check Details
articles.author: Deepak Gharai
articles.summary: Zomato is launching a 15-minute food delivery service in select cities in India. CEO Deepinder Goyal is also seeking collaboration with AI-driven business and product leaders to further the company's growth using artificial intelligence.

articles.title: HUAWEI nova 13 Series in Loden Green: The Stylish New Favourite of the Young and Trendy
articles.summary: HUAWEI has launched the nova 13 Series, featuring bold design innovations such as Dynamic Plaid Texture, Loden Green colorway, and the Super Star Orbit Ring. The series includes the HUAWEI nova 13 Pro with a quad-curved display and the HUAWEI nova 13 with a flat display design, catering to different aesthetic preferences.

articles.title: Lidl reveals limited edition Valentine's Day box for £5
articles.author: Carlo Simone
articles.summary: Lidl is launching its 'Premium Home & Beauty Set' on February 6th, available exclusively on the Lidl website. The set includes items from Lidl's Deluxe Home & Beauty Bays such as D'Avignon Handwash and Deluxe Manuka Honey. Lidl Plus users will also get 15% off selected Deluxe Home and Beauty Products in stores until February 12th.

articles.title: Lidl reveals limited edition Valentine's Day box for £5
articles.author: Carlo Simone
articles.summary: Lidl is launching a new 'Premium Home & Beauty Set' for £5, containing products worth almost £60, including items from Lidl's Deluxe Home & Beauty Bays. The box will be available for purchase on the Lidl website starting February 6th at 10am, with only 1,000 units available. Lidl Plus users can also enjoy 15% off a selection of Deluxe Home and Beauty Products in store until the 12th February.

articles.title: Witness Adobe Flash Revival in Newgrounds' Forward Jam 2025
articles.author: Gloria Levine
articles.summary: Newgrounds is hosting Flash Forward 2025, a game jam event focused on creating new Flash games and interactive movies. Participants are required to create new games or interactive movies that work via the Ruffle emulator and publish them on Newgrounds by April 6th with the 'Flash-Forward-2025' tag.

articles.title: TechCabal Daily ' TradeDepot takes a bite
articles.author: Techcabal
articles.summary: TradeDepot launched Mangrove, its food brand. Flutterwave CEO's venture studio launched an AI accelerator.

articles.title: IFF Adds Real-Time Consumer Feedback into Fragrance Creation with Introduction of AI-Powered ScentChat™ App
articles.author: PR Newswire
org: Global Human and Consumer Insights – Scent
articles.summary: IFF has launched ScentChat™, a new AI-powered research tool designed to enhance the fragrance creation process. The app connects consumers and IFF creatives through messaging platforms, providing real-time feedback using semantic AI and NLP to develop consumer-loved scents. This tool aims to make innovation more efficient and impactful in fragrance creation.

articles.title: Nintendo says its new Switch 2 console will be released in 2025
articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.summary: Nintendo will release the successor to the Nintendo Switch console this year. This announcement follows years of anticipation and rumors surrounding the new system.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra: Can AI completely transform the future of flagship smartphones?
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Ultra in Nepal, featuring design updates such as rounded corners and a titanium frame. The S25 Ultra includes enhanced AI features, a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, and a versatile quad-camera system with a 200MP main sensor. It is available in three colors and priced starting at Rs 184,999.

articles.title: How AI is Transforming Digital Marketing in Nigeria: A Blend of Innovation and Cultural Insight
articles.author: Olufemi Kazeem Oluoje
articles.summary: Nigerian companies are increasingly adopting AI to revolutionize their marketing strategies. Fintechs and banks use AI for personalized offers, e-commerce sites analyze customer behavior for recommendations, streaming services suggest movies, and QSRs adjust meal prices based on peak hours using AI. AI-driven design and NLP tools are also enabling SMEs to create high-quality content and ads in multiple Nigerian languages, optimizing ad spending.

articles.title: Dassault Systèmes Reveals "3D UNIV+RSES" and Related AI-Based Services
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Dassault Systèmes has launched "3D UNIV+RSES," a new technology embedding generative AI into global IP Lifecycle Management, designed to benefit its clients and evolve their existing 3D design and PLM data. The technology integrates with the 3DEXPERIENCE platform and supports Experience as a Service (XaaS) models like Generative Experiences (GenXp) and Virtual Twin Experience as a Service (VTaaS).

articles.title: New Barrow tech company aims to 'empower' other businesses
articles.author: Matthew Holmes.
articles.summary: JDC Digital launched on January 21, offering businesses rejuvenated digital presence through web development, mobile solutions, and AI-powered innovations. The company provides services such as web and mobile development, SEO enhancement, design and branding, and automated marketing. They also offer a free website audit service.

articles.title: KG Mobility launches Actyon SUV in Turkey amid growing demand
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: KG Mobility Corp. launched its flagship product.

articles.title: 36 Products That Are So Exceptional, Everything Else Just Can't Compete
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: Amazon offers a diverse range of new products and services. These include family-friendly, unbreakable deep plates made of wheat straw fiber, Dr. Bronner's soap concentrate for versatile cleaning, and an under-eye brightener with color-adapting formula. Also available are a pre-seasoned cast-iron skillet, a compact space heater, a Laneige glowy lip balm, absorbent Swedish dishcloths, antimicrobial toothbrushes, and more.

articles.title: What is Noni, The Superfruit That Is Sweeping Over Korean Skincare?
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: Korean skincare brands are incorporating Noni into their products. Products include Noni Cleanser for removing impurities and hydrating skin, Noni Toner to balance pH levels, Noni Serum for brightening and reducing fine lines, Noni Cream as a moisturizer, and Noni Masks for concentrated hydration.

articles.title: How iPhone got its first porn app despite Apple's censure
articles.summary: AltStore approved Hot Tub for iPhone distribution. C1d3r created Hot Tub as an alternative to adult websites, offering features like ad blocking and custom controls. Hot Tub also provides subscriber-only features such as advanced search and filtering.

articles.title: TradeDepot moves into food manufacturing with new brand, Mangrove
articles.author: Techcabal
articles.summary: TradeDepot is launching Mangrove, a new food brand that will produce and distribute affordable food items. The product line includes sardines, rice, flour, peas, and canned fish, aiming to offer cost-effective options to consumers.

articles.title: Ready to fly: Hyptec launches in Singapore with its gull-winged HT luxury EV, Lifestyle News
articles.summary: Hyptec, a sub-brand of GAC Aion, has launched its HT luxury crossover in Singapore. The HT features unique gull-wing rear doors and a luxurious interior designed for comfort, including reclinable rear seats and a massage function in the front seats. Vincar EV, the authorized dealer, is retailing the HT Premium at $230,988 with COE and the HT Luxury at $260,988 with COE, offering a $12,000 launch discount for a limited time.

articles.title: iPhones are getting their first-ever native porn app but not everyone can access it
articles.summary: AltStore has approved and launched the Hot Tub app, a native porn app, on iPhones and iPads in the European market. This app aggregates adult content from various websites and is available through AltStore due to the Digital Markets Act. Apple is against this decision, citing safety and security concerns for users.

articles.title: Samsung exhibits the advantages of the Galaxy S25 Series: Not just fast!
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 series, including the Galaxy S25 Ultra, S25+, and S25 models. The series offers various color options and is available for purchase starting January 23, 2025, with pre-order options and launch benefits like free memory upgrades and cashback offers. It boasts features like Corning Gorilla Glass Victus 2, Gorilla Armor 2, and AI integration.

articles.title: The best Valentine's Day gifts to shop in 2025
articles.author: Elizabeth Gracie
articles.summary: Several companies are launching or highlighting products for Valentine's Day 2025. Dyson offers a limited-edition Airwrap, while Crocs reimagines its classic clog with the Bae Clogs, including a free Jibbitz Pack. Soda Stream introduces a new Sparkling Water Maker. Other product highlights include MCoBeauty's heart-inspired makeup blenders, American Tourister's expandable suitcase in a Valentine's Day color, Ecoya's vanilla bean and passionfruit candle, Saint Juniper's Mediterranean Gin, Perfect Pony's Tame and Texture Hair Wax Stick, Matcha Made's Strawberry matcha blend, VUSH's Majesty 2 vibrator, Smilie's at-home teeth whitening kit, SaltLab's topical magnesium spray, and Argent Silversmith's customizable Loveheart Necklace.

articles.title: Lidl launches bargain Valentine's Day box with £60 worth of items for just £5 but you've got to be quick
articles.author: Laura McGuire
articles.summary: LIDL has launched a Valentine's Day box for £5, containing £60 worth of pamper products including Lavish Shower Gel, D'Avignon Handwash, Luxury Hand Lotion and Aromatic Body Cleanser. This limited edition box went on sale on February 6th, with only 1,000 units available online. LIDL previously launched similar limited edition boxes, including a beauty box in May and a mystery box in August.

articles.title: Lidl launches bargain Valentine's Day box with £60 worth of items for just £5 but you've got to be quick
articles.author: Laura Mcguire
articles.summary: LIDL has launched a new Valentine's Day home & beauty box, containing £60 worth of items, for £5. The beauty box went on sale on February 6th and was available to order online.

articles.title: Dunkin' opens fourth Greensboro location in heavy commercial area
articles.author: Business Journal
articles.summary: Dunkin' has opened a new location in Greensboro, offering its menu of food and beverages.

articles.title: Nestl� Collaborates with Dubai AI Campus to Transform the Future of Product Innovation through AI ...
articles.author: Emirates 24/7
articles.summary: Nestlé partnered with Dubai AI Campus to create an AI-powered tool. This tool will analyze trends and consumer insights. It will help Nestlé identify product innovation opportunities.

articles.title: 'Far Cry New Dawn' arrives on Xbox Game Pass
articles.author: Khaleejtimes
articles.summary: Microsoft added Far Cry New Dawn to the Xbox Game Pass subscription service in February 2025. This marks the 14th new title to join Xbox Game Pass since the beginning of the year. Ubisoft Montreal developed this open-world shooter.

articles.title: Postmates and DoorDash ready to deliver
articles.author: Magic Valley
articles.summary: In 2011, Postmates introduced the first online-powered in-person delivery service.

articles.title: I'm a makeup artist who asked ChatGPT to recommend products for me. The results seemed ...
articles.author: system
articles.summary: ChatGPT recommended beauty products from Maybelline and CoverGirl. It suggested versatile neutrals and browns for creating everyday or smoky looks.

articles.title: Samsung To Expand Its Galaxy Lineup In 2025?
articles.author: MENA FN
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 series. The Galaxy S25 Edge is expected to follow soon. Samsung competes with Apple.

articles.title: Vessi, known for waterproof comfort, unveils a new brand embracing rain and water magic
articles.author: Canada Newswire
articles.summary: A Canadian shoe brand is launching a redesigned waterproof sneaker brand in Canada and the US this February. The rebrand, a collaboration with NARI, aims to elevate the brand's core principles and align with a new growth strategy. The new design intends to invite everyone to experience their love and connection to water and rain.

articles.title: New Galaxy S25 breaks preorder record in S. Korea
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co. announced its new Galaxy S25.

articles.title: DeepSeek deployed in Tencent Cloud
articles.author: The Manila Times
articles.summary: Tencent Cloud has deployed DeepSeek's R1 model onto its Hyper Application Inventor application service. This allows developers to access the AI service quickly. Users can now focus on leveraging AI for business applications without needing technical expertise.
